column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////On my most recent visit we got a pitcher of Sangria
column3: and a paella loaded with all sorts of meat. I've got to say
column4: the meat paella was significantly better seasoned than the seafood paella I had had previously. With that said
column5: it's difficult to decide which is better
column6: so I guess you should just try both!
